entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:49 p.m. PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 2:00 AM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: S 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
